Description: Ivory chess-piece, a rook; carved with a hemispherical base and bifurcating top.
Bibliographic references: Dalton 1909 / Catalogue of the Ivory Carvings of the Christian Era with Examples of Mohammedan Art and Carvings in Bone in the Department of British and Mediaeval Antiquities and Ethnography of the British Museum (609)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
